attributes.action: Amend the Freedom Of Speech Rights within the United Kingdom
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We Petition the Government of Great Britain to revoke the (Freedom of Speech
Rights) to those who cause insult or dare to oppose our countries ways and traditions by means of hateful protest or the incitement of aggression towards the British people and the Imprisonment of and/or removal from this country of those who partake instigate or invoke such.
